title: Man's Coverlet (Sakhalare)
description:
man\'s coverlet, wool and cotton with tassels (Bouki serra), African XXc  stored in box; dims 76 x 35\'; stored with 86.100.24,25
Name: Sakhalare. Used for great festivities and market days. Worn folded over left shoulder. S85-94.
creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
